fire: This is an emergency alert! Fire outbreak reported in your area. Immediate assistance required.
accident: URGENT: Road traffic accident reported. Location: [INSERT LOCATION]. Requesting immediate assistance.
assault: Emergency: Assault incident reported. Requesting police intervention.
robbery: ALERT: Robbery in progress. Requesting immediate police response.
medical: Medical emergency: Patient in critical condition. Urgently need medical assistance.
kidnapping: Kidnapping incident reported. Urgently require police intervention.
domestic violence: Domestic violence reported. Requesting police assistance.
burglary: URGENT: Burglary in progress. Immediate police response needed.
sos: SOS: Urgent assistance required. Location: [INSERT LOCATION].
